name: Sedan
description: A passenger car with a three-box configuration (engine, passenger, and cargo).

name: SUV
description: Sport Utility Vehicle designed for higher ground clearance and off-road capability.

name: Coupe
description: A stylish car typically with two doors and a fixed roof.

name: Convertible
description: A car with a retractable roof that can be lowered or removed.

name: Hatchback
description: A compact car with a rear door that swings upward to provide cargo access.

name: Wagon
description: A vehicle with an extended rear cargo area and a roofline similar to sedans.

name: Minivan
description: A family-friendly vehicle designed for passenger comfort and cargo space.

name: Pickup Truck
description: A light-duty truck featuring an enclosed cab and an open cargo bed.
